official_title: To authorize an exchange of lands in South Dakota and Colorado.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey all Federal rights and interests, except mineral rights, in certain national forest lands in Summit County, Colorado, and Lawrence County, South Dakota, to the Homestake Mining Company of California in exchange for certain of its lands in Lawrence and Meade Counties, South Dakota, subject to specified terms and conditions. Directs the Secretary to convey to Summit County, Colorado, all Federal right and interest in certain lands known as "Summit County Landfill," subject to specified conditions. Adds acquired lands to the Black Hills National Forest.

titles.title: To authorize an exchange of lands in South Dakota and Colorado.
